#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define gc getchar_unlocked
using namespace std;
//typedef long long int ll;
void scanint(int &x)
{
    register int c = gc();
    x = 0;
    int neg = 0;
    for(;((c<48 || c>57) && c != '-');c = gc());
    if(c=='-') {neg=1;c=gc();}
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
    if(neg) x=-x;
}
int main()
{
	int t,x,y,temp,ctr,w[8][4001],p=1,o,sum;
	scanint(t);
	for(int i=2 ; i<=9 ; i++)
	{
	  int val[4000]={1};  ctr=1;
	  for(int j=1 ; j<=4000 ; j++)
	  {
         sum=0; temp=0;
		 for(int q=0 ; q<ctr ; q++)
		 {
		   	o=val[q]*i + temp;
			val[q]=o%10;
			temp=o/10;
	     }
	     if(temp)
	       val[ctr++]=temp;
	    for(int i=ctr-1 ; i>=0 ; i--)
	         sum+=val[i];
	    w[i-2][j-1]=sum;
      }
    }
	while(t--)
	{
		scanint(x); 
		scanint(y);
		if(y==0)
		  printf("Case %d: %d\n",p,1);
		else
		 if(x==1)
		  printf("Case %d: %d\n",p,1);
		else
	      printf("Case %d: %d\n",p,w[x-2][y-1]);
	    p++;
	}
   return 0;
}
